title: Winner by TKO Down The Stretch
itunes:title: Winner by TKO Down The Stretch
description: It is arguably the greatest weekend in sports with the NHL and NBA Playoffs in full swing, the NFL Draft, The Kentucky Derby and Mayweather vs Pacquiao. We will touch base on the fight and the Derby before smoking the newest from Selected Tobaccos, the 56 ring gauged Byron. All that and the usual shenanigans on The Cigar Authority.
